p: We reconstructed time-calibrated epidemic histories using a Bayesian statistical framework implemented in the software package BEAST version 1.8.4 ( Drummond et al. 2012). BEAST uses Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) integration to average over all plausible evolutionary histories for the data, as reflected by the posterior probability. All analyses were performed using the Broad-platform Evolutionary Analysis General Likelihood Evaluator (BEAGLE) library to enhance computation speed ( Suchard and Rambaut 2009; Ayres etÂ al. 2012).
